title: A detailed interpretation of fighting in a dream

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of sweat in a dream through this article. God Almighty said: “O you who are in the sessions, inform me of my vision, if a vision comes to me.” (43) A race in a dream often shows a person’s struggle, which also shows the spirit of effort made by the dreamer, and in today’s encyclopedia we present different interpretations of a dream about races, follow us.Interpretation of matches in a dreamInterpretation of fighting in a dream by Ibn SirinIf someone sees in a dream a running race. This vision expresses that this person is looking for a lawful livelihood in his life. This vision also symbolizes the competitive spirit that the person with the vision possesses in all aspects of his life. Seeing victory in a race expresses the success of that person in an aspect of his life. Seeing running in A dream generally represents effort, and in the dreamer's case, winning the race in his dream. This is an indication that he can achieve what he is looking for. As for watching a running race without participating in the race, this indicates the necessity of reversing some of the decisions that the fortuneteller made in his life and that he will have to wait to make decisions. Interpretation of a dream about holding a match in a dream From Ibn Shaheen’s interpretation of a race Running in a dream: One of the interpretations of seeing running in a dream is that it symbolizes the search for abundant halal food. As for the person who sees that he has won a running race, this indicates his success in certain aspects of his life. Seeing him losing in a running race means that the dreamer will make a series of decisions The mistake in his life. In his case, he watched a running race without participating in it. His vision shows that all his decisions are wrong and he has to reconsider those decisions. Seeing running in a race also symbolizes the fear that the viewer feels about responsibility. Interpretation of a running race in a dream for a single woman: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is chasing a man in a race. This vision expresses the unmarried girl's pursuit of achieving one of her goals. If she runs after an animal. This vision shows victory and sovereignty over all enemies. If a girl sees that she is running after a herd of sheep; This vision symbolizes the enormous food that comes to him, and it also symbolizes the pursuit of goodness. Interpretation of a running race in a dream for a married woman: If a married woman dreams that she participates in a running race and runs fast. This vision expresses her intense fear that her children will get sick. One of the interpretations of her participation in racing in a dream is that she is striving after all goals and means of livelihood. As for seeing her running fast. This vision shows that this woman faces many problems and difficulties in her life and that she will be able to overcome them. Interpretation of running a race in a dream for a pregnant woman: If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is running with her arms and legs; This vision symbolizes the approaching date of her birth. Seeing her in a running race, running fast. It is a vision that expresses her easy birth. If she is quarreling with one of the men. This is a sign that she will give birth to a boy. Interpretation of a running race in a dream for men: If a young man sees in a dream that he is fighting with someone. This vision shows the competitor

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing my ex-wife’s father in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing my ex-wife’s father in a dream. In the following lines, we will learn the interpretation of a dream about seeing my ex-wife’s father in a dream and whether it is good or bad according to the books of scholars..Interpretation of a dream about seeing my ex-wife’s father in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about seeing my ex-wife’s father in a dream can express Solving problems, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees the father of his ex-wife in a dream, this may be evidence of his return to her, and God knows the unseen. While seeing the mother of my ex-wife may represent gossip and talk, and God knows best. Also, seeing my ex-wife’s people may indicate that solutions have been reached. And God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my son’s ex-wife in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my son’s ex-wife in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this. However, seeing a divorced woman in a dream may be a sign of changes in her situation, and God knows the unseen. In the event that a divorced woman sees a married woman in a dream, this may be evidence that she is moving to a new place, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees A divorced woman, as this may indicate illness, and God knows the unseen. I dreamed that I was walking with my ex-wife in a dream. I dreamed that I was walking with my ex-wife in a dream. It may be a sign of an attempt to return to the man, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees himself walking with his ex-wife in a dream, this may be evidence that he is getting rid of problems, and God knows the unseen. When you see a divorced woman walking with a divorced man, this may express her good treatment of her divorced wife, and God is Most High. Know that if a divorced woman is seen walking with her ex-husband in a narrow place, this may lead to her husband’s lack of maintenance, and God knows best. I dreamed that I was traveling with my ex-wife in a dream. I dreamed that I was traveling with my ex-wife in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this, but seeing a divorced woman’s trip may indicate some changes, and God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees a divorced woman’s trip in a dream, it may be a sign of good changes, and God knows best. Likewise, if a divorced woman is seen traveling in a car, this may indicate livelihood. God willing, the interpretation of dreams about a bald divorced woman in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about a bald divorced woman in a dream. We did not find specific interpretations to see that. If a divorced woman sees a bald child, it may be a sign of consolation, and God knows best. When a divorced woman sees a bald child, this may indicate psychological comfort, and God knows the unseen. When a divorced woman sees a bald woman, it may This is a sign that she has been tempted and that God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my divorced neighbor in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about seeing my divorced neighbor in a dream. We did not find any specific explanations for seeing this, except that seeing a divorced woman may express a woman’s need for help, and God knows all that is unseen. If the dreamer sees a divorced woman in a dream, it may be a sign of sadness, and God is Most High and Knows. If the dreamer sees a quarrel with a divorced woman in a dream, this may be evidence that she is demanding. Her rights, and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of the bride in a dream for single, married and pregnant women

preview.html: In the following paragraphs, we will explain to you the interpretation of the bride in a dream according to what was interpreted by the scholar Ibn Sirin. The bride is the girl on her wedding night, and what distinguishes her is that she is wearing a white wedding dress. Sometimes a woman sees in her dream that she is wearing a wedding dress, and when she wakes up she is engaged in thinking. Regarding the meaning of this vision and its significance, scholars believe that the meaning of this dream varies according to the condition of the married sleeper and the pregnant woman in detail.Interpretation of the bride in a dreamInterpretation of the bride in a dream by Ibn SirinIbn Sirin believes that seeing the bride in a dream indicates the emergence of problems and difficulties that the dreamer will suffer from in his life.And if The sleeper saw in his dream a bride and his dream lacked singing and dancing, so this is Mahmoud’s dream that shows the change that is taking place in the dreamer’s life and makes it better. If one dreams and sees a bride in a huge wedding, then this is a bad vision that indicates the occurrence of misfortunes and tribulations and may indicate the death of one of the dreamer’s relatives. And only God knows the time. The scholar Ibn Sirin says that seeing the bride in a dream is a bad sign for the dreamer and not a good one. If the sleeper sees in his dream that people are presenting to him as a groom or a bride, then this is a good vision that shows the reputation of the fortuneteller among the people. Hearing singing in a dream portends events Happy in the dreamer’s life. Interpretation of seeing a bride in a dream for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is wearing a wedding dress, this is a good vision that promises the dreamer that he will achieve all the goals he desires. And if an unmarried woman sees in her dream a doll wearing a wedding dress, then this vision It indicates the date of her approaching engagement or wedding. Dream interpretation scholars say that if an unmarried girl sees her bride in her dream and hears drums and songs in this dream, then this is an unpleasant vision that indicates the arrival of worries and problems that will disturb her. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is a bride sitting Next to the groom whom she knows, this is a good vision that heralds happy news and may indicate the girl’s excellence in studies or her promotion at work. If an unmarried girl dreams that she is going to a wedding for unknown people, then this vision indicates a great experience in the girl’s life. Interpretation of the vision A bride in a dream for a married woman. Jurists say that if a married woman dreams and sees in her dream that she is wearing a wedding dress, then this vision indicates that she will move to live in another place, and this vision may indicate her travels. Also, seeing a married woman wearing a white wedding dress in a dream indicates that This woman has a good heart and a pure personality, and she likes to see things positively. Seeing a girl wearing a wedding dress in a married woman’s dream indicates that God Almighty will carry her in the near future. Seeing a bride in a married woman’s dream indicates the stability of her married life and that she will live a good life with Her husband without problems. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is wearing a bride’s dress and she is happy with it, then this dream indicates the arrival of sufficient sustenance and a lot of goodness in her life. Interpretation of seeing a pregnant bride in a dream. If a woman sees a pregnant woman

title: Interpretation of sheep in a married woman’s dream

preview.html: Interpretation of pregnancy in a dream for a single woman, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, for a man. If you see a dead sheep escaping from a black and white sheep eating the lamb’s legs, the sheep entering the house, according to Ibn Sirin and others. Dreams have signs and indications in our lives. When one sees a vision in his dream, he searches online for the correct meaning of that vision. Today, through this article, I present to you the greatest scholars and interpreters of dreams. Interpretation of a sheep in a dream for a married woman. As for a married woman, seeing a sheep in her dream means pregnancy, so if that sheep is white and her husband bought it or gave it to her, and if she dreams that it is dead, she knows it. A white sheep, this is a sign that the deceased needs continuous charity for him or her through ongoing charitable work. However, if a married woman sees that there is a strange man giving her a sheep, this means that there is a covenant between her and another that she has not fulfilled, and it may be money, a trust, or Other than that, sight may differ from man to woman and vary in love of time and place, and it also differs from one woman to another, so the dreamer must tell his vision as it is in order to arrive at the correct and accurate interpretation. Interpretation of a sheep in a married woman’s dreamIf a married woman sees it in her dream That she buys a sheep is evidence of her responsibility and that this woman does not respect her family and is suffering from problems. The dream is evidence of slander and gossip in this woman’s life, and God is Most High and Most Knowing.

title: Interpretation of seeing an egg yolk in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: In this article, we will explain from our website a comprehensive interpretation of this vision in the case of a man and a woman, single, young, pregnant, and what the interpreters believe about seeing an egg yolk in a dream. Interpretation of seeing an egg yolk in a dream for one girl. The interpretation of seeing an egg yolk in a dream for one girl varies depending on her condition. If she sees a raw egg yolk in a dream, this indicates her bad luck in reality. It also indicates the presence of hateful people who hate and bewitch her. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream with a boiled egg yolk indicates the closeness of her relationship. Eggs in general if they are cooked. Or boiling it in a dream for a girl. It also indicates good luck and happy news in the coming period. It also indicates the girl’s ability to fulfill all her desires. Likewise, an unmarried girl in a dream collects egg yolks, which means her marriage to a just and generous person who achieves what she desires. If an unmarried girl is studying, egg yolk means excellence and success. Seeing an unmarried girl in a dream with immature egg yolk means that she is in an illicit relationship. Egg yolk in a dream for an unmarried girl indicates that she is speaking badly about her friend. See also Interpretation of a dream about collecting eggs from under a chicken. Interpretation of seeing egg yolks in a dream for a married woman. A married woman saw an egg yolk in her dream but did not give birth. The vision was evidence of the imminence of pregnancy, God willing. Seeing a married woman in a dream dreaming of a large amount of egg yolks is evidence of her abundance of money and that she Spend on it without fear of poverty. One of the unpleasant dreams of egg yolk in a dream is seeing it rotten. Wherever the vision indicates, the dreamer will be exposed to many problems in his life. It also indicates the presence of disagreements with the husband, and God knows best. Rotten eggs in a dream for a married woman are evidence of her bad behavior. With people. A married woman who eats rotten eggs indicates that she has a rotten and disobedient son. If a married woman sees uncooked eggs in a dream, this means that she will make difficult decisions. Boiled eggs without shells in a dream for a married woman means that she has committed many sins. Interpretation Seeing an egg yolk in a dream about a man and its meaning. Seeing a married man in a dream with eggs coming from his wife’s side. Details of her pregnancy and the birth of a male child. Either the egg yolk comes out of the wife in the man’s dream in its correct form. The vision means that her child will be a good son with a high status, God willing. A married man sees in a dream that his wife is laying eggs, but she is corrupt. This means that she is pregnant and giving birth to a male child, but her morals are bad. Seeing a man in a dream turning eggs with a stick is evidence that he has a good and kind wife. Boiled eggs in a man’s dream indicate an abundance of food and plenty of Money. Uncooked eggs in a man’s dream make wrong decisions and mean committing many sins. Read also: Rotten eggs in a dream. The meaning of seeing an egg yolk in a pregnant woman’s dream and its interpretation. Seeing a pregnant woman with an egg yolk in a dream is a vision worthy of praise. As the vision indicates the approaching moment of her birth. For a pregnant woman to see egg yolks

title: Interpretation of going to the airport in a dream

preview.html: The interpretation of going to the airport in a dream At the airport shows a person’s desire to move to another place or go to a new place and you may also be interested in knowing: The accident in a dream and seeing the airport in a dream can be different for a single girl than for a married woman, and seeing a man is completely different About seeing a woman having this dream, and let us get to know the interpretation of each dream, including these visions. You may also be interested in the following: I saw my husband getting married. Interpretation of going to the airport in a dream. Interpretation of going to the airport in a dream. Ibn Sirin went with his interpretation of this dream, which is seeing the airport, Which means trying and trying to get something new in the lives of each of us. When a person goes to the airport and sees the plane traveling far away and he can bid farewell to some of those close to him in that place, and this separation is difficult and effective, this is evidence that there are some problems between them and that he wants to get rid of them because This vision. But if a person sees in his dream the airport in remote areas where there is no one, then this is evidence that this person will travel to a far place, but he does not get what he wants and does not find a job opportunity as he dreams or otherwise, then it is disappointment that we fall In it.You may also be interested in: Pumpkins in a dreamInterpretation of seeing an airport in a dream for a manEvery one of us dreams of traveling, but men always dream of you traveling far away to get a better job opportunity in addition to big profits.If a man witnesses that he is waiting for the plane and it is too late for him, He must know that he will undertake a project, and that this project will fail due to the delay of the plane. If a person sees in a dream that he has already arrived on the plane and gone to a beautiful place and feels great joy, then this is evidence that he will live a life full of excitement and pleasure in the coming days, or it is possible That a happy and satisfying job will come to him. His dreams. You may be interested: Talking with the dead in a dream. Interpretation of seeing an airport in a dream for a single woman. The airport in a single woman’s dream is evidence of her desire to obtain a higher position than the one she holds now, if she is in a job. If an unmarried woman sees the airport in a dream and gets on the plane Which she was waiting for, this is evidence that she is marrying a young man and that he will agree with him and take her into the world of love. And romance and the fulfillment of her dreams, because the plane is a sign of goodness, especially if one can fly it. If an unmarried woman sees that she is waiting for someone who will come from traveling, this is evidence that she has honesty and loyalty, and there are many loyal friends on her side, and marriage will take place. Through these loyal friends who stand by her. Her side. You may also be interested in knowing: The death of a child in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about an airport for a married woman. title: Interpretation of reading the Qur’an in a dream for a single woman: “The correct and complete interpretation.”

preview.html: Interpretation of reading the Qur’an in a dream for a single woman. Interpretation of reading the Qur’an in a dream for a single woman in detail. The Holy Qur’an is one of the miracles that God Almighty revealed on earth and will remain in place until the Day of Resurrection. They know its prohibitions and avoid them. An unmarried girl may see in a dream that she is reading the Qur’an, so she wants to know the meaning of this vision and what it shows. Interpretation of one dream of reading the Qur’anThe Holy Qur’an in a single woman’s dream symbolizes her feeling of security and peace in her life. And if the fortuneteller goes in the wrong path. Her dream of the Qur’an heralds her repentance to God Almighty and her return to Him. This dream also foretells to her that she will soon achieve what she wants and that God will ease her distress and give her a good husband. Seeing the recitation of the Holy Qur’an in an unmarried woman’s dream is a praiseworthy interpretation because it indicates that the dreamer is on the path The correct one. This vision also indicates that its owner will receive happiness as a reward for his commitment. Another interpretation of this vision is that it symbolizes the owner of the vision who is honest and trustworthy and seeks to benefit others and will obtain a lot of goodness. Whoever sees in her dream that she is reading the Qur’an and actually doing it. Her vision showed that she was characterized by justice and agreement in matters of religion. When an unmarried woman dreams that she is reading the Qur’an. This means that there are many beautiful qualities that distinguish the divine. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is reading the Holy Quran. The dream shows that she keeps her promises and wants to complete all her work. This vision also indicates that the dreamer will enter a new phase in his life and may assume a prominent position. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is reading the Qur’an with the intention of memorizing it. This vision indicates that she obtained money after her financial situation deteriorated. This vision also shows that its owner makes the right decisions in her life, if the dreamer has not memorized the Qur’an. The vision here expresses assuming a great position and obtaining a wish that was complicated for her. Seeing an unmarried woman opening the Book of God to read in it indicates that her desires will be satisfied and the doors of goodness will be opened for her. One of the ominous visions for an unmarried girl is her dream of reading the Qur’an in the bathroom. It appears that someone is trying to harm her with magic, so she must be careful. Reading the Qur’an about an unmarried woman in a dream by Imam Al-SadiqImam Al-Sadiq says that the dream of an unmarried girl reading the Holy Qur’an symbolizes that God will bless her with a high position in the world. This vision refers to the dreamer Enjoining good and forbidding evil in reality. When an unmarried woman sees in her dream that she is reading the Qur’an, she is in reality disobeying God. The dream shows that he sincerely desires to repent for these sins and return to God Almighty. Interpretation of the dream of reading the Qur’an in a beautiful voice for a single woman: An unmarried woman’s dream of reciting the Qur’an in a beautiful voice indicates her good reputation and high status among those who know her. It also indicates the large number of people who want to marry someone Insight because of its piety and good characteristics. title: Interpretation of seeing someone being hit by a car in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing a person colliding with a car in a dream via the vision website roy2a.com. Seeing a person colliding with a car in a dream has many indicators. Insight, his circumstances, and whether he is single or female, married or pregnant. Today, through the Vision website, we will discuss in detail the interpretation of seeing someone colliding with a car in a dream, based on the opinion of major translators such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Katheer, Al-Nabulsi, and Imam Al-Sadiq, so follow us. What is the interpretation of vision? A person being hit by a car in a dream according to Ibn Sirin? Seeing a person being hit by a car in a dream indicates the dreamer’s frequent thinking about what will happen in the future and feeling anxious about it. Seeing a person being hit by a car in a dream may indicate the dreamer’s emotional life, which is full of disputes and crises. Seeing a person being hit by a car in a dream indicates Until the visionary is unable to perform the tasks assigned to him in life. See also: I dreamed that I was driving a car with a dead person. Interpretation of seeing a person collide with a car in a dream for a single woman? Seeing one person falling on a car in a dream indicates that she has committed many things. The mistake in her life. Seeing one person falling on a car in a dream shows that she is a distracted girl and cannot arrange her affairs and what she wants in life. Seeing one person crashing into a car and going crazy in a dream indicates her distance from people close to her and the creation of new relationships. Seeing one person falling on a car In a dream, this vision can be considered as a warning about the bad things that she does in her life. See also: Interpretation of seeing a stolen car in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing someone hit by a car in a dream for a married woman? Seeing a married woman who fell on a car and died in a dream indicates that she is overthinking something. What and her inability to make a good decision about it. Seeing a married woman running over someone in a dream says that he will do wrong to that person. Seeing a married woman running over an unknown person in a dream shows that there will be some problems for her in the near future. Seeing a married woman running over someone, but not Something happens to him in a dream. She expresses her feeling of remorse and remorse for the mistakes she committed against that person and her desire for compensation. What is the interpretation of seeing someone being hit by a car in a dream for a pregnant woman? Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream being run over by a car indicates that she is thinking a lot about the birth process and what will happen to her and feels anxious. Regarding that. Seeing a pregnant woman in a dream indicates that she will soon undergo the process of labor, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing a car driving with a dead person in a dream. What is the interpretation of seeing someone colliding with a car in a dream for a divorced woman? Seeing in a dream a divorced woman run over by a car says that she is going through a difficult period. In her life, full of crises and problems. Seeing a divorced woman in an accident and escaping from it in a dream shows that she is a strong and patient woman capable of overcoming all the bad things in her life. What is the interpretation of seeing someone being hit by a car in a dream for a man? Seeing a man hitting someone with his car in a dream shows that in the near future He will face some problems with someone he does not know. Seeing in a dream t

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about menstruation for a married, non-pregnant woman?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about menstruation for a married, non-pregnant woman: The menstrual cycle occurs in girls when they reach puberty, and it is also one of the signs that indicate a woman’s health and fertility, but when a married, non-pregnant woman sees menstrual blood, she is afraid and anxious about this vision and takes it. Refuge. In search of the appropriate meaning for it, and through this article we will explain in detail the interpretations and meanings of seeing the menstrual cycle for a married, non-pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about the menstrual cycle for a married, non-pregnant woman. What is the interpretation of a dream about the menstrual cycle for a married, non-pregnant woman? When a married woman sees her period in her dream, senior scholars have interpreted This vision is primarily beneficial to its owner. When a married, non-pregnant woman sees menstrual blood in her dream and in reality she is facing financial problems and accumulating debts, the vision promises her abundant goodness that will come to her and enables her husband to pay off all debts. If this woman Without children and yearning to have children, her vision of her menstrual cycle is evidence of her imminent pregnancy and the birth of the desired child. If a non-pregnant married woman sees that her menstrual blood is abundant in red, this indicates her success in achieving the goal that she set before her eyes. If a non-pregnant married woman purifies herself Of menstrual blood, this indicates the end of a period that was full of marital strife, and the return of things to normal between her and her husband. Interpretation of a dream about the menstrual cycle of a non-pregnant married woman by Ibn SirinoIbn Shirin explained that if a married, non-pregnant woman sees her period in her sleep and has reached old age, this is a sign of God will grant her well-being. The menstrual cycle of a married, non-pregnant woman is evidence of the abundant goodness that will come her way and the blessing that will come in her life. It has also been reported that if this woman sees her menstrual period, this indicates the stability of her married life and a happy life, prosperity and well-being in life. The non-pregnant woman When a pregnant woman sees menstrual blood unclean and contaminated, this indicates serious marital disputes that will arise between her and her husband. Learn more than 2,000 interpretations by Ibn Sirin Ali on the Egyptian Dream Interpretation website from Google. The most important interpretations of a dream about menstruation for a married, non-pregnant woman. Interpretation of a dream about menstruation at a different time for a married, non-pregnant woman when A married woman who is not pregnant sees that her turn has come at an irregular time, this means that her husband will be away from her for some time and menstruation is at an irregular time in the dream of a married woman who is not pregnant. It is a sign of the sudden end of a difficult stage in her life and indicates imminent goodness for her that she did not expect to obtain. Interpretation of a dream about the cessation of the menstrual cycle for a married, non-pregnant woman. The vision of the cessation of the menstrual cycle for a married, non-pregnant woman has two meanings: The first is that this woman is exposed to a serious and difficult problem during her period. The current one must think and find the appropriate solution for the second. It is an indication that this wife will find the perfect solution to her problem and get rid of it permanently. Interpretation of a dream about menstruation for a married woman who is not pregnantA married woman who is not pregnant

title: Read what Ibn Sirin said about the interpretation of fifty pounds in a dream?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing 50 kg in a dream? The dreamer sees in his dream that he found 50 pounds somewhere or took it from someone and he can see it as new or worn out and sometimes he sees a dead person giving it to him in a dream. Interpretation of seeing banknotes in a dream There are general implications for money In all its shapes and colors, which we will present in the following: First: It can indicate the dreamer’s victory and victory over his enemies. Second: If the dreamer dreams that he has won notes in his dream, whether in a 50-pound denomination or anything else, then this is a sign that he is a strong and confident person. His abilities. Third: If the dreamer donates a sum of money in his dream, then this dream indicates that he will perform many good deeds in his life, such as feeding the poor and needy and giving money to the needy to satisfy their needs, and it may be what the guardians of orphans and jurists said: It is among the best deeds. The good that a person does is zakat on the dead constantly. Fourth, if the dreamer collects money in a dream, this is a sign that he is a greedy person, or perhaps he is hiding a secret from those around him, and the dream reveals the feeling of stress and tension that he will experience in a short period. time. Term. Fifth: If the dreamer sees in a dream that he owns a large sum of money of all kinds and denominations, this is a sign that he likes to excel over people. Unless the dreamer steals money from others in a dream, this is a bad sign that he is invading people’s privacy and secrets. Perhaps the vision indicates an increase in responsibilities on his shoulders, and some jurists put another sign for this dream that there is a great opportunity that the dreamer will soon take advantage of. If a married woman steals from her husband’s money in a dream, this is a sign that she is arrogant in dealing with him and interfering in his privacy. Seven If the dreamer is counting A large number of banknotes in a dream, this is a sign of the worsening of his problems, as he will be surprised when he wakes up from disagreements and problems that he did not expect to appear. Eight commentators said that if the fortuneteller finds inside his house a number of banknotes of various denominations, this is a sign that he will soon quarrel with someone Members of his family, either his wife, brother, or one of his parents. With them so that the interpretation of the dream does not fall and one of them loses, and the loss is great for him. Ninth: The dreamer can see in his dream banknotes stained with blood, and this scene is very dirty and is interpreted with more than one bad sign, which are as follows: that the fortuneteller walks on the forbidden path and earns money from it, and this The matter will be the cause of the ruin of his life later, so he must monitor his actions and return to the correct path and abandon the path of misguidance, which is forbidden. Until God gives him a blessing in his life. That the dreamer will intentionally commit a sin, and this is very bad because he knows how dangerous what he is doing is and that it will bring God’s wrath upon him, but he continues to do it without shame or fear of God. It indicates that the fortuneteller is opportunistic and thinks about his own best interest. Firstly, he does not care about the interests of others, and therefore the jurists said that he will expose someone to injustice in order to reach a certain amount of money soon. The Interpretation of Dreams section on an Egyptian website includes
